ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Dimensional/Locomotive Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( NS_InteractionReason__c ,'Dimensional/Locomotive'), ISPICKVAL( NS_Type__c ,'Live-Loads'), ISPICKVAL(Status, "NS_Closed"), NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, ISBLANK( NS_LoadIDNumber__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Load ID prior to closing the Case.
